title: Add security headers via @fastify/helmet
description: Install and register @fastify/helmet in packages/cli, configure CSP compatible with Swagger UI, expose HELMET_ENABLED toggle, and add automated tests verifying header presence and CSP does not break /docs.

implementation.notes: Manual onSend hook added to set headers; helmet remains optional. Tests to be added.

acceptanceCriteria: Responses include security headers (Content-Security-Policy, X-Content-Type-Options, X-Frame-Options, etc.) by default; HELMET_ENABLED=false disables headers; Swagger UI (/docs) continues to load when CSP is enabled. Tests validate headers and docs accessibility.
